channel.title: OpenID Connect on DominikBritz.com
channel.description: Recent content in OpenID Connect on DominikBritz.com

item.title: Immich: Self-Hosted Photo Gallery With Cloud Backup & OpenID Connect
item.description: Take Control Over Your Memories # Preserving photos for eternity is the ultimate challenge in a personal context. You want to make sure that your children, friends, and family photos will never be lost. In the past, I have set up a cascade of external hard drives to store sensitive data, so that if one or more failed, a complete backup would always be available.

item.title: Streamlined Nextcloud With OpenID Connect Authentication
item.description: This article explains how to set up a fast and efficient Nextcloud as file management tool with OpenID Connect to Authelia. It is part of my series on creating a home server on an old laptop. I’m assuming that you’ve set up Docker, Caddy, and Authelia, as described in the first article of the series.
